LanguageData.Epona_Research_Smith.label: Epona Forging
LanguageData.Epona_Research_Smith.description: Learn the traditional forging of epona.
LanguageData.Epona_Research_FullPlate.label: Epona Full Plate
LanguageData.Epona_Research_FullPlate.description: Learn how to manufacture Plate Armor that can cover the whole body.
LanguageData.Epona_Research_Shield.label: Epona Balistic Shield
LanguageData.Epona_Research_Shield.description: Learn how to manufacture a Balistic shield that is heavy but has a clear performance.
LanguageData.Epona_Research_Steam.label: Epona Steam Power
LanguageData.Epona_Research_Steam.description: Learn how to manufacture power armors with steam power.
LanguageData.Epona_Research_SteamGatling.label: Epona Steam Weapon
LanguageData.Epona_Research_SteamGatling.description: Learn how to manufacture Heavy weapons that can be fired with steam power.
LanguageData.Epona_Research_Munition.label: Epona Munition Gear
LanguageData.Epona_Research_Munition.description: Learn how to manufacture weapons of epona, where design and metrology are unified.
LanguageData.Epona_Research_HandCannon.label: Epona Handcannon
LanguageData.Epona_Research_HandCannon.description: Learn how to make large-caliber handcanons.
LanguageData.Epona_Research_Saw.label: Epona War Saw
LanguageData.Epona_Research_Saw.description: Learn how to manufacture combat circular saws with excellent cutting power.
LanguageData.Epona_Research_Sewing.label: Epona Sewing
LanguageData.Epona_Research_Sewing.description: Learn how to sew simple epona clothes.
LanguageData.Epona_Research_AdvancedSewing.label: Epona Advanced Sewing
LanguageData.Epona_Research_AdvancedSewing.descriptio: Learn how to sew advanced epona clothes.
LanguageData.Epona_Research_JackofPlate.label: Epona Battle Singlet
LanguageData.Epona_Research_JackofPlate.description: Learn how to make Jack of Plate.
LanguageData.Epona_Research_Bombarrot.label: Boomarrot
LanguageData.Epona_Research_Bombarrot.description: Learn how to grow Boomarrot, which are used as shells or as a kind of currency.
LanguageData.Epona_Research_Cannon.label: Boomarrot Cannon
LanguageData.Epona_Research_Cannon.description: Learn how to manufacture Boomarrot Mortar and organ guns.
LanguageData.Epona_Research_MonsMeg.label: Gordyfu Cannon
LanguageData.Epona_Research_MonsMeg.description: learn how to make a huge siege cannon.
LanguageData.Epona_Research_Kitchen.label: Horse's Kitchen
LanguageData.Epona_Research_Space.label: Epoland can into space!
LanguageData.Epona_Research_Space.description: Epoland cannot into space... Really...? (for SOS2!)
LanguageData.Epona_Research_Alicorn.label: Alicorn Medicine
LanguageData.Epona_Research_Alicorn.description: You can use Alicorn to turn industrial medicine into glitterworld medicine.
LanguageData.Epona_Research_Elixir.label: Alicorn Elixir
LanguageData.Epona_Research_Elixir.description: how to make an elixir that can heal permanent wounds that can be crafted using Alicorn.
